name: Perfect location & Private Room w/ Airbed Near T!
description:
My place is close to Fields Corner Red Line T station and is MBTA accessible... Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location. It is close to JFK/UMASS and JFK Library, 2 T stops away from the house.
My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers and the bedroom comes with a "Comfortable Airbed" as shown in the pictures.

The space
The Private Bedroom also comes with a "Comfortable Airbed", Computer Desk & Chair and has 1 closet.

Guest access
Guest has access to all common areas.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe
3) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
NO Parking (between 12 pm-4 pm) on Street Cleaning Day, on the 3rd Wednesday and Thursday of the month. Guests can park on Alternate Side Street.
